channel.title: I need to disable "report abuse" button on my server asap!
channel.description:
I need to disable it ASAP. Its a dupe issue and people are abusing it. Is there way to remove it or disable it at least and if not that at least make it so u cant click it while in duel.
Thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 22, 2007, 12:11:02 AM[/size][hr]there has to be a way to disable the button... NE1 KNOW??

item.title: I need to disable "report abuse" button on my server asap!
item.dc:creator: @elitescouter elitescouter
item.description:
@elitescouter wrote:

It still doesent work.

Here is the issue

As soon as they press Accept on the last 1 if they press report abuse it is pressable. I need it disabled.

Read full topic

item.title: I need to disable "report abuse" button on my server asap!
item.dc:creator: @sebastianm10 sebastianm10
item.description:
@sebastianm10 wrote:

You could Disable it through your Files… Just take off the Command on your client.java.

Search the Phrase “Offensive Language” and delete the whole Command area.

But I recommend you to search a TUT To make it so you cant click it through Duel

Read full topic
